lead_paragraph: Moscow is seriously worried about North Korea's latest missile drills, which saw Pyongyang fire four ballistic missiles into the sea off Japan's northwest, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said on Monday.

headline.main: Kremlin Says Seriously Worried About North Korea Missile Drills
